methods.name: GetCategorySellers
methods.description: The GetCategorySellers API call retrieves a list of sellers from a given category allowing you to browse the category by seller.

methods.name: GetCategoryStructure
methods.description: The GetCategoryStructure API call retrieves a list of categories, displaying the category depth and result ranking.

methods.name: GetCategoryTopTitles
methods.description: The GetCategoryTopTitles API call retrieves a list of top titles from a selected category.

methods.name: GetCategoryTrends
methods.description: The GetCategoryTrends API call retrieves graphed trend data for a category search. It can return trends up to 90 days, and breakdowns by week, day, or hour.

methods.name: GetCategoryHotList
methods.description: The GetCategoryHotList API looks at a category by category overview of listings growth vs. bid growth to determine categories that are attracting buyers faster then sellers. It can return these categories along with various methods of ranking them for a single day, for all of the sites available through the API.

methods.name: GetHotProducts
methods.description: The GetHotProducts API call retrieves a list of products that are determined to be "hot".

methods.name: GetMediaHotList
methods.excludeFromTestReason: the test needs a valid media type name
methods.description: The GetMediaHotList API call retrieves a list of media that are determined to be "hot".

methods.name: GetTopTitles
methods.description: The GetTopTitles API call retrieves a list of all items from a given category allowing you to browse the category.

methods.name: GetResearchResults
methods.description: The GetResearchResults API call is used to retrieve basic pre-calculated statistics for a specific set of keywords, along with other filters. This call has REST support.

methods.name: GetResearchSellers
methods.description: The GetResearchSellers API call can be used to retrieve top sellers for a keyword.

methods.name: GetResearchTrends
methods.description: The GetResearchTrends API call retrieves graphed trend data for a search using the inputs provided in the GetResearchResults call. It can return trends up to 90 days and breakdowns by week, day, or hour.

methods.name: GetSellerResearchResults
methods.description: The GetSellerResearchResults API call retrieves seller specific research in a similar manner to the GetResearchResults call. All of the same filters available in the GetResearchResults call are available here, plus the Seller Filters.

methods.name: GetSellerResearchTrends
methods.description: The GetSellerResearchTrends API call retrieves trends based on the seller data similar to the SellerResearchResults call. It returns its data in a similar format to the original GetResearchTrends call.

methods.name: GetSellerTopTitles
methods.description: The GetSellerTopTitles API call retrieves a list of all the top items with seller stats from a given category allowing you to browse the category.

methods.name: GetItemConditionLookups
methods.description: The GetItemConditionLookups API call retrieves a list of all possible Item Condition values within a given Category.

methods.name: GetItemSpecificSets
methods.description: The GetItemSpecificSets API call retrieves a list of all items from a given item specific set so that you can browse items with similar characteristics.

methods.name: GetPriceResearch
methods.description: The GetPriceResearch API call returns basic pricing statistics for a set of keywords over a variable date range. This call has REST support.

methods.name: GetSingleItemDetails
methods.excludeFromTestReason: Terapeak seems to time out on this call. Investigating.
methods.description: The GetSingleItemDetails API call retrieves the details for a single item.

methods.name: GetSystemDates
methods.description: The GetSystemDates API call retrieves the start and end dates currently supported by the system.

methods.name: GetTitleBuilderResults
methods.description: The GetTitleBuilderResults API call retrieves popular keywords used in listings based on a seed keyword phrase. It researches a sample of listings and returns metrics such as average, minimum, and maximum price.

methods.name: GetCategoryItems
methods.description: The GetCategoryItems API call retrieves a list of all items from a given category allowing you to browse the category.

methods.name: GetResearchItems
methods.description: The GetResearchItems API call can be used to retrieve the raw items found for a search using the inputs provided in the GetResearchResults call. It can return up to 200 items at a time, and returns them in a similar format to the original GetResearchResults call items.

methods.name: GetSellerResearchItems
methods.description: The GetSellerResearchItems API call retrieves the raw items found for a search using the inputs provided in the GetSellerResearchResults call. It returns up to 200 items at a time.
